links.title: Kim Jong Un willing to discuss getting rid of North Korea's nukes, US says
links.description: North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un said he's willing to talk with President Trump about getting rid of North Korea's nuclear weapons as part of a denuclearization across the Korean Peninsula, a Trump administration official confirmed to Fox News on Sunday.
